subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony celebrated his late addition to the Western Conference All-Star team by scoring 34 points, and the Denver Nuggets defeated the host Indiana Pacers, 102-95, last night to snap a three-game losing streak.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony celebrated his late addition to the Western Conference All-Star team by scoring 34 points, and the Denver Nuggets defeated the host Indiana Pacers, 102-95, last night to snap a three-game losing streak.
